name: Slash FX / Effect on Tile Change
author: AdmiralJaden
info: Allows you to add LWeapon effects to a slashable (or changeable) combo.Edit 1: Updated with an example file.Edit 2: Forgot to update the actual script with some changes (facepalm) - this edit updates the script.
description: You probably need ffcscript.zh (to be safe), and of course std.zh.Import as normal. Set your combo/slashable, put an ffc wigh this script in it, over the combo in question, set the following:D0 - itemset that your item drops fromD1 - LWeapon to display on changeD2 - sound that plays on slash/changeThis does NOT have to use secrets. For slashables, just use a slash->next combo type or similar.
